survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the current wellness programs offered by the company to assess effectiveness and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the wellness programs currently offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: This question helps gauge awareness levels. Use a Likert scale for clarity.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the wellness programs currently offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs have you participated in within the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participants.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs have you participated in within the last 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Include a neutral option and 'Not applicable' for those who haven't participated.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: What factors prevent you from participating in the wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs are not relevant to my needs
Programs are not accessible (e.g., location, timing)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q2
questions.client_notes: Use conditional routing to target non-participants. Allow 'Other' with an open-text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

answer_options: Programs are not relevant to my needs
